name: Armored Combat Tank Warfare Online
description:
Real Time 3D Online Multiplayer Tank Combat!

- Battle in a World War 2 setting against millions of other players and be the HERO!
- Climb the Leaderboards of Heroes!
- Rank in the High Score charts!
- Get Achievements!
- Play solo missions for exercising your tactics!
- Explore different Battlefields in the World of Tanks!
- Play in round based death match games!
- Duel in quick matches with different panzers!

++++++++++++++++
"The graphics is so owning. I LOVE IT!!" (User review)

"The game offers some truly breathtaking visuals for a mobile game and a deathmatch experience unlike any other on the App Store" (Appadvice)
++++++++++++++++

The best looking Online Multiplayer Tank game!
No advertisements.

- Finest 3D graphics
- 1 vs 1 online duels
- Real time physics
- Real time shadows
- Destructible buildings
- Game Center
- Achievements
